message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I take a bit more considering the inflation disadvantage I have.
I understand the inflation disadvantage, but your starting offer was too low. Let's find a more equitable split.
Your offer was closer, Bob, but still not quite fair to me.  This is my counter-offer.
Time is running out, Alice.  I'm aiming for a fair deal, acknowledging your lack of inflation but also considering we both lose if this fails.
